name: jiopat
tagline: jiopat is a toolkit including many tools for I/O Pattern study.
body:
jiopat
======

jiopat is a toolkit including many tools for I/O Pattern study. It includes the following:

* fuse-io-tracer
* fuse-io-Trace-Replayer
* MapReplayer
* PatFuse
* LibPatternDetector
